alert.note: Alert for Covington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 6:03PM CDT until May 11 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN MARION...SOUTHEASTERN COVINGTON...NORTHWESTERN LAMAR AND SOUTHERN JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTIES... At 603 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Sanford to Improve, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Sumrall, Sanford, Morgantown, Goss, Holly Springs, Society Hill, Bunker Hill, Improve and Melba. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
